ygData.subject: Re: re> bard travelling services
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know about all the other bards out there, but I have never charged for any service I can provide. Well, other than blacksmithing. Anyways, the amount
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know about all the other bards out there, but I have never charged
for any service I can provide. Well, other than blacksmithing.
Anyways, the amount that is a reasonable charge is so small and paltry,
especially considering alot of the people I help are lower levels, that I
dont see it being worth it to charge them. Anyways, thats my view on it.
Rolande, Drunken Bard of Povar
-----Original Message-----
From: toren@... <toren@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 12:22 PM
Subject: [eqbards] re> bard travelling services


>From: toren@...
>
>heres a topic tha should be rehashed i guess. charging for our services,
i have escorted numerous people all over and no i do not charge for the
service. i have found much like corpse location that i will usually gain a
donation and some sincere thanks. and those people that i do work with are
usually willing to help me at a later date or even ask me to join a group
for a while.
>as an added bonus when escorting i tend to end up places i may not have had
designs on going originaly.
>
>Torenithus Legendmaker
>Bard of Qeynos
>
